DOC.brief_summary: The main objective investigate effect concurrent dose 10 mg ramipril 80 mg telmisartan multiple-dose pharmacokinetics telmisartan ramipril . Therefore relative bioavailability telmisartan ramipril give combination determine comparison either telmisartan ramipril give alone .
DOC.brief_title: Steady State Pharmacokinetics Telmisartan , Ramipril Combination Following Repeated Oral Doses Healthy Male Female Volunteers
